data.message: Slim you have more material than ever to rap about this fucktard baffon running our country. Just tell it like it is. Patiently waiting.

replies.message:
Trump 2020. STFU and stop crying.

He did a thing with Trump years ago. Anything he says negative about him is an act, and to sell to libtard dumbasses like yourself.
Booooooom.. lol whats funny is though that fucktard baffon (bafoon) is YOUR President.. unless of course you dont live here..
Waaaaahhhh, I didn't cry about Obama
Becuase Barack Obama was a man of integrity and a world respected leader.
Just because trumps your president don't mean you have to like him what you afraid your gonna get taken out by the c.i.a 😂😂
Obama was an embarrassment at least Trump has balls. Fucking cry baby liberal :)
Robert Redditt is terrible at arguing

Its pointless to argue with ignorant trump supporters, their arguments defy logic🙄
All they can do is what their retarded president does, yell Obamas name👌🏽Zeven A. Viero go back to your trailer and finish your meth.
Robert Redditt and all you do is cry about the president, so what's your point?
This guy spitting hot fire crying about Trump 😂 because somehow it had to go there.

Michael Curatolo my point is watching all the hate filled Trunp supporters chime in. Its quite entertaining, boo hoo everyone else is the source of your problems. Im sure Trump is looking out for you😂😂😂
Robert talking about hate while he gay bashes and calls people retarded. Liberal logic. Lmao

I'll take liberal logic over someone stupid enough to vote for mr. Crybaby Twitter its everyones fault and youre entitled to more. Hows that workin out for you Odin😂😂😂Wheres those jobs, and healthcare? Screw your teenage tweeting little girl of a president. And Im not gay bashing, for the record I love gays, mexicans, muslims, black lives, islamists, and know better than to blame others for the eighty percent of domestic terrorism born, bred, and raised right here in the America. Nor do I feel entitled to anything that I dont put in hard work for. Trump just duped ignorant people into believing everyone else is a threat to hier entitlement😂
